page.title: 08A FINZEAN TEACHER'S DAY
page.content: I have twelve children in a composite class of Primary 1-4 which means age range 5-8 years.The emphasis is on meeting the needs of the individual. During a normal day I expect to hear each child{reading}from a set book at his/her own level. The children will do{Maths.}which may be of a practical nature.Environmental studies can be on a variety of topics e.g.Myself,Food-usually around harvest time-or based on a TV programme. This session the{computer}has taken its place in the classroom and we have all enjoyed{Granny's Garden.This} program has encouraged creative writing as the children imagine what might happen next at each stage in the exploration.Art work and co_ordinates work in Maths.have emerged from it. All have made Granny's Garden books. .
